Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your needs. This product holds immense value to us, but I understand its worth may be different for you. I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $7500. This is a limited-time offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement that benefits both of us. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $7,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $7,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
